original_title: Amy Schumer: Live at the Apollo
overview: With her unique blend of honesty and unapologetic humor, Amy Schumer is one of the funniest, freshest faces in the industry today. This October, Schumer's provocative and hilariously wicked mind will be on full display as she headlines her first HBO stand-up comedy special: 'Amy Schumer: Live at the Apollo.' Directed by Chris Rock, the one-hour special features the comedian talking about her life and was taped before a live audience at New Yorkâ€™s iconic Apollo Theater.
title: Amy Schumer: Live at the Apollo
